refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A Note is an admonition set off from the main text.

In some types of documentation, the semantics of admonitions are clearly defined (Caution might imply the possibility of harm to equipement whereas Warning might imply harm to a person), but DocBook makes no such assertions.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: Often outputs the generated text Note or some other visible indication of the type of admonition, especially if a Title is not present. Sometimes outputs a graphical icon or another symbol as well.
